generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, including white dashed lines and arrows, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and featuring parked bicycles.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including multi-story residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and in the background, providing greenery to the urban scene.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: Several people are visible on the sidewalk on the right side, standing or walking near the bicycles.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including vehicles directly in front of the camera and parked along the left side.
- bus: A white and blue bus is visible on the left side of the road, stopped or moving slowly.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging above the road, with red lights illuminated.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a blue circular sign and other signs mounted on poles along the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs along the road.
- bicycle: Numerous bicycles are parked on the right sidewalk, secured to racks or standing upright.
